mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mbr_cd, mbr_id, mbr_pw, grd_cd, mbr_nm, mbr_nicknm, mbr_telno, mbr_addr, mbr_daddr, mbr_zip, mbr_eml, mbr_birth, stc_cd, mbr_gender, mbr_join_ymdt, mbr_agre_yn) values (#{memberCode}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, 'USER', #{memberName}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTelNo}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberDAddress}, #{memberZip}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberBirth}, 'SD_ACTIVE', #{memberGender}, now(), #{memberAgreeYN});
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(a.na_adjtv, ' ', b.nc_colrs, ' ', c.nka_animals) AS random_nickname FROM (SELECT na_adjtv FROM nickname_adjectives ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) a, (SELECT nc_colrs FROM nickname_colors ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) b, (SELECT nka_animals FROM nickname_animals ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) c WHERE CONCAT(a.na_adjtv, ' ', b.nc_colrs, ' ', c.nka_animals) NOT IN (SELECT mbr_nicknm FROM member)
